data.name: Updated - Game & Script ROBLOX Background
data.description: This is just for some people that wanted a specific background for their ROBLOX game. If you want to see the twitter post of the image, visit here: https://twitter.com/CheekySquid/status/886030050814029826

data.name: Roblox Full-Width Black Game Page Theme
data.description:
False alarm, not broken, it all works, everything is fine, Just an extension I had messing with the layout.

Dark theme is recommended.
Stylus is recommended for use instead of Stylish

ATTENTION BTROBLOX USERS!
Make sure these settings are set to OFF:
Hide Ads = Off (Use adblock or something)
Keep Sidebar Open = Off
Entire Game Details Category = Off
https://i.imgur.com/L6rkNOu.png

data.name: Jenkins Monokai Dark
data.description:
A Monokai theme for jenkins featuring dimmer colors for links.
Not just an inverse color style.

data.name: VVSU Dev management
data.description: Support for SNTX+, expanding panel and zooming edit buttons

data.name: Ayuppie
Surviv.io Rooftop Chllin
F-List Dark - Redesign (Flat, hover effects)
data.description:
Adjusts F-List Dark theme to look more flat and with hover effects.
Also adjusts F-Chat 2.0 to look flat and improves hover effects and makes text editor dark.
Also adjusts F-Chat 3.0 to add some colors to status indicators (WIP)

data.name: My Claflin Dark Mode
data.description: Install this style to use my.claflin.edu in dark mode

data.name: Gmail Quick Links Extension: New Gmail Mods
data.description: Modify the links added by the Gmail Quick Links extension to better fit within the new gmail styles, especially when the sidebar is collapsed

data.name: Hacker News - Dark, Centered & Simple
data.description: Just a quick style I made to make HN a bit more readable for me. Thanks to Serkan Hosca style 22794 since I used part of his code for the color scheme. Not sure about anyone else but I can skim through text much faster on a big monitor when the text is centered in this style.

data.name: Bogleheads Dark
